Assistant HR Manager Job at African Foundries Limited




        
    

        
        African Foundries Limited (AFL) was established to support the accelerating growth in Nigeria by making the country self-reliant for steel rebars and eliminating its dependence on imported rebars. AFL is set up to reach a 0.5 million-ton per year capacity for high strength rebars and allied products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant HR Manager

Job Location: Ogijo, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The ideal candidate must have strong ability to Manage contractors / contract workers management.
	This is a very critical job role; we need someone who would focus more on this and report possible gaps after analyzing contract workers attendance.


Responsibilities


	Minimizes legal liabilities and reputational damage by ensuring contractors operate within legal and safety boundaries.
	Guarantees that outsourced work meets the organization's standards and objectives.
	Proactively identifying and managing potential issues, such as safety hazards, payment complications, or operational disruptions, to protect the organization's reputation and bottom line- must have his ears on ground to avert strike actions by contract workers
	Verifying contractors' credentials,payment of insurance to date. Ensuring contractors meet legal and regulatory requirements
	Fostering clear and effective communication between HoDs/ Shift -in- charge and contractors.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 5 - 7 years of experience.
	The candidate must have either intermediate or advance knowledge in excel.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: folajimi.omolara@africanfoundries.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
